I am a defendant in a civil proceeding initiated by Tristan Cockman against members of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) relating to the Party's decision not to endorse him as a candidate for Cowan at the 2016 federal election. While I have already disclosed my membership of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) and while I do not see how a perceived conflict could arise, for completeness I also declare that the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) is covering the legal costs of this matter.
Tickets to the West Coast Eagles v Melbourne AFL match on 15 May 2022 from Seven West Media.
Tickets to attend the Netball Australia Grand Final on 3 July 2022 in Perth from Netball Australia.
Tickets to attend the 2022 State of Origin Round Two game on 26 June 2022 in Perth from the NRL Commission.
Tickets to attend the Fremantle Dockers v West Coast Eagles on 13 August 2022 from the West Australian Football Commission.
Tickets for myself and my wife to attend the 2022 Telethon Ball held on 22 October 2022 provided by SevenWest Media.
My wife no longer works at Vulcan Energy. She still holds performance rights attached to her name, however, as she has left the company these will not be vested with her.
I no longer have a car loan with Volkswagen Finance. This loan has been paid.
Myself and my wife have opened a joint transaction and savings account with Macquarie Bank.
On 14 March the Supreme Court of Western Australia, Court of Appeal, in the matter CACV 37 of 2022, dismissed the appeal from Tristan Cockman with costs awarded to myself and other respondents.
On 2 April 2023 I accepted the hospitality of three tickets to the RAC Western Derby at Optus Stadium, provided by Optus.

On 24 March 2023, I accepted hospitality from the Rottnest Island Chamber of Commerce for their Rottnest After Dark event. This event included two return charter tickets from Fremantle to Rottnest and general hospitality.

I have accepted a place in the McKinnon Institute Advanced Political Leadership program for 2023. This scholarship includes costs of delivering the program, training, education, accommodation in Adelaide, ground transport and hospitality.
Two tickets to the Midwinter Ball on Wednesday 21 June 2023, for myself and my wife, provided by Sky News.
Two tickets to Disney on Ice on Saturday 17 June 2023, for myself and my son, provided by Seven West Media.

I accepted an invitation from Singapore's Minister for Foreign Affairs, Dr Vivian Balakrishnan, to participate in the S R Nathan Fellowship from 2 to 5 July. In accordance with advice from the Department of Prime Minister and Cabinet, flight and Ministerial travel costs to Singapore were covered by the Commonwealth. I declare that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Singapore provided ground transport, accommodation and hospitality.

Further to my update of 22 March, I advise that Mr Cockman has applied for this matter to be heard by the High Court. While I have already disclosed my membership of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) and while I do not see how a perceived conflict could arise, for completeness I also declare that the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) is again covering the legal costs of this matter.
Corporate suite tickets from Qantas to the Western Derby West Coast Eagles v Fremantle Dockers on Saturday 12 August 2023 for myself and my wife.

Further to my update of 19 July 2023, I advise that the High Court has dismissed with costs Mr Cockman's special leave application, [2023] HCASL 145. While I have already disclosed my membership of the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) and while I do not see how a perceived conflict could arise, for completeness I also declare that the Australian Labor Party (WA Branch) covered the legal costs of this matter.

disclosures.entity: Seven West Media and Anthony De Ceglie
disclosures.details: Four tickets to the Wiggles concert on Saturday, 18 November, for myself, my wife Jess and our two children from Seven West Media and Anthony De Ceglie, Editor In Chief.
Two tickets to the Telethon Ball 2023 on Saturday 21 October 2023, for myself and my wife.
My wife has received a membership from the University Club of Western Australia.
My wife has a FEE-HELP debt from her Master of Business Administration.
Myself and my wife accepted tickets to the Women in Resources Awards from the Chamber of Minerals and Energy on Friday 22 March 2024.
I have agreed to participate in the McKinnon Institute's Scholars Program.

disclosures.entity: WA Labor Foundation Investment Company Pty Ltd
disclosures.details: My wife has taken on a role as a non-executive director of the WA Labor Foundation Investment Company Pty Ltd. There is no remuneration for this role.
I no longer have a privately owned electorate vehicle and no longer have a loan for this vehicle.
Ticket for myself and my wife to attend the 2024 Press Gallery Midwinter Ball charity event from Lion Corporate.
I accepted two tickets to the Fremantle Dockers v West Coast Eagles on Saturday, 27 July at Optus Stadium from the West Australian Football Commission.
Tickets for myself and my wife to attend the 2024 Telethon Ball provided by Seven West Media.
Myself and my wife accepted tickets from the Tourism Council WA to attend the 2024 Perth Airport WA Tourism Awards.
Room upgrade at Shangri-La Sydney during my stay dated Tuesday 3 December to Thursday 5 December.
My wife has a NAB Business bank account in her name.
My wife receives income for work as a consultant including work for the McKell Institute.

disclosures.entity: 2025 Open Government Partnership Asia Pacific Regional Meeting
disclosures.details: I accepted a special event jacket from the 2025 Open Government Partnership Asia Pacific Regional Meeting. I have retained this jacket and asked the Department of Prime Minister and Cabinet to invoice me for the value over the official limit in accordance with the Guidelines relating to official gifts received.
Room upgrade at Shangri-La Sydney for evening of 23 February 2025.
